title: AI-Based Live Portrait Technology
content: D-ID Live Portrait technology was used in the Harry Potter movies in order to animate still images, using 'driver' videos.

title: Autodesk Maya
content: Some of the most powerful visuals in the Harry Potter movies used Autodesk Maya to bring characters to life through 3D movement, displaying and rendering highlights.

title: Visualization Software
content: The software used to generate images of smoke and clouds in the Harry Potter films, is now also being used in neuroscience to render neurons and brain structures by applying these techniques to magnetic resonance imaging (MRI) scans.
